channel.title: Projects on aloosefish
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on aloosefish

item.title: Ideas
item.description: Here are some personal projects I am interested in working on, in no particular order: The Weirdest Things Analyze content tags for front-page news stories of major national newspapers to find the most unusual stories See how or if the subject matter has changed over a period of several years Sans Swagger Use a neural network to create a rap lyric generator Applications of agent-based modeling in financial portfolio analysis Segregation study Use US Census data to rate tracts according to levels of ethnic and racial diversity Create an interactive map to visualize findings Analysis of software terms of use Automated to incorporate textual changes as they are made Analysis of minutes of public government meetings Presenting analysis in a way that allows portions of it to be “plugged-in” to any type of public meeting where minutes are taken
